Put the pan on the counter
Grab the knife off of the counter
Slice the apple in the fridge
Put the knife in the pan

Put the apple slice in the pan

Slice up the tomato that's in the sink.

Put the plate into the microwave.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick the knife up from off of the table.
Open the microwave, slice the potato, and close the microwave.
Open the microwave, place the knife inside of it, and close the microwave.
Open the microwave, pick up the potato slice inside, close the microwave.
Place the potato slice in the pan on the stove.
Pick up the pan from the stove.
Open the refrigerator, place the pan inside, and close the refrigerator.

Open the fridge and cut the apple in the fridge, and close the fridge
Put the knife on the pan on the stove
Pick up the pan with the knife from the stove
Put the pan on the table
Open the fridge, pick up a piece of apple, and close the fridge
Put the apple piece on the pan with the knife

cut the apple inside of the sink
open the pull out drawer on the left side and place the knife inside
grab a slice of the apple
place the apple inside the sauce pan on the bottom left burner
pick up the sauce pan off of the bottom left burner
place the sauce pan inside the fridge

Cut the tomato in the fridge into slices and close the fridge.

Place the slice of tomato on the left plate near the plant.

Place the plate next  to the cut tomato in the fridge and close the door.

Place the pan on to a shelf of the refrigerator.

Put the apple in the bowl

pick up the bowl with the apple and knife
